The aiida-fans plugin for `AiiDA`
=================================

``aiida-fans`` is available at http://github.com/ethan-shanahan/aiida-fans

``FANS`` is available at https://github.com/DataAnalyticsEngineering/FANS


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   user_guide/landing
   developer_guide/landing
   AiiDA Documentation <https://aiida.readthedocs.io>

``aiida-fans`` is released under the GNU General Public License v3.

Please contact ethan.shanahan@gmail.com for information concerning ``aiida-fans`` and the `AiiDA mailing list <http://www.aiida.net/mailing-list/>`_ for questions concerning ``aiida``.
